GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article object, fetched by id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: adjusts article vote count by input inc_votes, then returns the updated article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for given article id
